newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - CTC Communications started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - CTC Communications started.

text.p: -- National Securities Corp said it is initiating coverage of CTC Communications Corp with a buy rating based in part on future opportunities for telecommunications resellers in the wake of the Telecommunications Act of 1996.
-- The company is a leading reseller of telecommunications services in the Northeast with virtually no competition in its service region, National Securities said.
-- National Securities also set a price target between $13 and $15 based on its earnings estimates of $0.43 a share in fiscal 1997 and $0.57 in fiscal 1998.
-- CTC Communications shares were unchanged Friday at 7-7/8.
